revised_title: Travelling Reaction Fronts in the Nitric Acid Oxidation of Thiocyanate
tldr: The authors investigate the phenomenon of travelling reaction fronts in the nitric acid oxidation of thiocyanate. They discover that the oxidation of thiocyanate yields a well-defined red-colored reaction front, which they study and analyze. A computer model is used to describe the traveling waves, and the results are consistent with a simple analytical treatment.
